scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/index.html && cp main.js dist/main.js && cp styles.css dist/styles.css && cp sw.js dist/sw.js && cp manifest.webmanifest dist/manifest.webmanifest && cp -r public dist/public && mkdir -p dist/icons && cp public/icons/app.jpeg dist/icons/app.jpeg && cp public/logo.png dist/logo.png
